long_description: Whether you're maneuvering single track or patrolling the beach, you'll dig the protection from-and looks of- the men's Julbo Kaiser Sunglasses. Spectron 3+ polycarbonate lenses block 88% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Mirror effect on the lenses improves visible light filtering. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight yet offer excellent shatter resistance. Julbo Kaiser Sunglasses come with a protective case.
short_description: Whether you're maneuvering single track or patrolling the beach, you'll dig the protection from-and looks of- the men's Julbo Kaiser Sunglasses.
